titleStmt.title: The character of a London-diurnall with severall select poems / by the same author.
titleStmt.author: Cleveland, John, 1613-1658.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Cleveland. Cf. BM.
Fifth ed. Cf. Morris, B. John Cleveland (1613-1658), a bibliography of his poems, D5. Wing calls this 4th [i.e. 6th] ed., 22 poems.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
